snippet: A band member, Robert Champion, died after being beaten and suffocated by fellow students during a hazing ritual in November.
abstract: Thirteen people are charged with hazing in the death of Robert Champion, Florida A&M University marching band member who was beaten after a football game in fall 2011; case is one of the largest ever built on felony hazing, charge that carries up to six years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A band member, Robert Champion, died after being beaten and suffocated by fellow students during a hazing ritual in November.

headline.main: Criminal Charges for 13 in Florida A&M Hazing Death
headline.print_headline: 13 Are Charged in Deadly Hazing at Florida A&M
